Module Contents

.. class:: LambdaLayer(lambd)


   Bases: :py:obj:`torch.nn.Module`

   Layer that applies arbitrary function in forward pass.

   .. attribute:: lambd

      Function to apply in forward pass.

      :type: function

   .. method:: forward(self, x)
